main event: An unidentified object sighting was recorded in Hermosa Beach, California, on August 29, 1955, described as a lighted experimental balloon.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 5 to 8 minutes., The object was silver and had 3 other objects hanging from it., The observation was stationary., The sighting was conducted using Ground-Radar and Air-Visual type observations., The conclusion stated there was insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: lighted experimental balloon with three other objects hanging from it
